scripts.build: bun run --cwd frontend build && bun run --cwd server build
scripts.dev: bun run -b --cwd server dev & bun run --cwd frontend dev
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd frontend lint && bun run --cwd server lint
scripts.format: bun run --cwd frontend format && bun run --cwd server format
scripts.test: bun run --cwd frontend test && bun run --cwd server test
